Hero.intro: Software developer with experience in challenging projects, from educational applications to adaptive interfaces. With 2 years in backend and frontend development, I am now focused on creating enterprise solutions that integrate data analytics and artificial intelligence. Passionate about learning and contributing to innovative projects.

About.title: About me
About.description: Since my university years, I discovered my passion for software development while studying electronics in automation. Although my background was in automated systems, programming captured my interest, leading me to complete a thesis combining software, automation and artificial intelligence.
About.description2: My professional career started in the development of educational applications and games, where I gained experience in backend and frontend using Unity and C#. During that time, I learned how to manage data, implement responsive interfaces and collaborate with multidisciplinary teams, such as design and QA. I also worked with agile methodologies such as Scrum, adapting to constant changes and keeping the focus on delivering quality products.
About.description3: Today, I'm looking to expand my skills into the enterprise realm, studying technologies such as Python, JavaScript, TypeScript and React. My goal is to develop innovative solutions that combine artificial intelligence and exceptional user experience.
About.description4: Outside of work, I enjoy researching technology, exercising and exploring different cultures, activities that inspire me to grow both professionally and personally.

points.p1: Design and develop a human-machine interface (HMI) to display weight values from scales.
points.p2: Create a program capable of reading data from scales, managing variations in data order through dynamic identification and extraction of relevant information.
points.p3: Collect and organize data for comprehensive analysis of weight measurements across scales.

points.p1: Develop a network monitoring application using Kotlin, enabling real-time signal supervision.
points.p2: Collect and process real-time signal data for enhanced analysis and decision-making.
points.p3: Store collected data in flat files, ensuring efficient retrieval for subsequent analysis.
points.p4: Design an intuitive and user-friendly interface to improve usability and enhance user experience.

points.p1: Design and program mechanics for mobile games using Unity and C#, including optimizing development times with Scriptable Objects, reducing level creation time from 4 hours to less than 2 hours per level.
points.p2: Develop responsive UI and language-switching systems for mobile applications, while implementing key functionalities such as login systems with Google and PlayFab.
points.p3: Configure and use the PlayFab SDK to integrate cloud storage, account management, and in-app purchases with Unity IAP, achieving an effective monetization strategy.
points.p4: Implement local save systems with serialized JSON files, ensuring sub-1-second save times and enhancing user experience.
points.p5: Resolve compatibility issues during the compilation and distribution of applications on the Google Play Store, ensuring functionality on Android devices.
points.p6: Use Git for version control and set up organized workflows on GitHub with dedicated branches for development, testing, and production, ensuring code stability.
points.p7: Work under the Scrum methodology to promote team collaboration and optimize project development.

prj1.title: Portfolio
prj1.description: Website created with React, Tailwind and JS to showcase my skills as a developer. It includes responsive design, modern animations, language system and light/dark modes. This project allowed me to learn path and state management in React, as well as resource optimisation.

prj2.title: Obtaining data
prj2.description: Mobile application in Kotlin to collect 4G and 5G antenna data from Android devices, with the goal of improving signal quality. I learned how to read antenna data and use Jetpack Compose. The project was approved by the client.
